Class Crop

java.lang.Object
Crop
Direct Known Subclasses:
Flower, RootCrop, Tree
public abstract class Crop extends Object
An abstract class representing various Crops and Crop Types. Gets planted in and grows on Tiles.

  • Constructor Details

    • Crop

      public Crop(String name, char id, int harvestTime, int water, int fertilizer, int bonus, int prodMin, int prodMax, int seedCost, int sellPrice, double xp)
      Constructor for class Crop; parameters define the crop's values for the variables declared above. This constructor is used to create the different crops which have different properties/characteristics.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the crop
      id - the unique character id of the crop
      harvestTime - the number of days required before the crop can be harvested
      water - the amount of water needed by the crop
      fertilizer - the amount of fertilizer needed by the crop
      bonus - the bonus limit of the crop
      prodMin - the minimum amount of produce a crop can make
      prodMax - the maximum amount of a produce a crop can make
      seedCost - the cost of planting the crop
      sellPrice - the price of a crop's produce
      xp - the experience yield of the crop

  • Method Details

    • grow

      public void grow()
      This method adds a day to the crop's growth.

      public void die()
      This method sets the crop's growth value to -1, meaning that the crop has withered.

    • generateProduce

      public int generateProduce()
      Randomly generates the number of products produced by a crop. Uses the crop's minimum and maximum number of produce as range.
      Returns:
      this crop's number of produce between specified range.
